questions_answers.question: How do I install ComfyUI Vextra Nodes?
questions_answers.answer: 1. Install [ComfyUI](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI). 2. Clone the repository in the ```custom_nodes``` folder inside your ComfyUI installation or download as zip and unzip the contents to ```custom_nodes/ComfyUI-Vextra-Nodes```. 3. Start/restart ComfyUI.
questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Vextra-Nodes

questions_answers.question: What is the Pixel Sort node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes?
questions_answers.answer: Pixel Sort is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides a pixel sorting effect by [satyarth](https://github.com/satyarth/pixelsort). It installs the pixelsort module upon installation.
questions_answers.subject: Pixel Sort

questions_answers.question: What is the Swap Color Mode (Black & White) node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes?
questions_answers.answer: Swap Color Mode (Black & White) is a custom node that swaps the color mode to luminescence or single channel. It can be useful for creating masks or making images black & white. It is also helpful when changing RGB modes.
questions_answers.subject: Swap Color Mode (Black & White)

questions_answers.question: What does the Solid Color node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes do?
questions_answers.answer: The Solid Color node generates an empty solid color image with options for color, size, and batch size.
questions_answers.subject: Solid Color

questions_answers.question: How can I add text to an image in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes?
questions_answers.answer: You can use the Add Text To Image node to supply the path to a .ttf file and add text to an image input. It has options for anchor placement, rotation, color, and more.
questions_answers.subject: Add Text To Image

questions_answers.question: What node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes allows me to play sound during execution?
questions_answers.answer: The Play Sound node allows you to play sound during execution.
questions_answers.subject: Play Sound

questions_answers.question: What does the Prettify Prompt (PromptGen) node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes do?
questions_answers.answer: The Prettify Prompt (PromptGen) node uses the gpt2 AI model to prettify your prompt.
questions_answers.subject: Prettify Prompt (PromptGen)

questions_answers.question: What is the purpose of the Generate Noise node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes?
questions_answers.answer: The Generate Noise node generates various noises to use in masks or blending.
questions_answers.subject: Generate Noise

questions_answers.question: What does the Flatten Colors node in ComfyUI Vextra Nodes do?
questions_answers.answer: The Flatten Colors node flattens the colors of an image to a variable amount of colors.
questions_answers.subject: Flatten Colors
